TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RijndaelManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael
Public NotInheritable Class RijndaelManaged Inherits Rijndael
public ref class RijndaelManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Rijndael

summary.span: 存取 演算法的 Managed 版本。

span.span: Accesses the managed version of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此演算法支援金鑰長度 128、 192 或 256 位元;將預設為 256 位元。This algorithm supports key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 256 bits. 在.NET Framework 中，此演算法支援 128、 192 或 256 位元; 區塊大小預設為 128 位元 (-相容)。In .NET Framework, this algorithm supports block sizes of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 128 bits (-compatible). 在.NET Core 中，它相當於 AES，並可支援 128 位元區塊大小。In .NET Core, it is the same as AES and supports only a 128-bit block size. 演算法是的前身。The algorithm is the predecessor of . 您應該使用類別而不是。You should use the class instead of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[Rijndael 之間的差異和 AES](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) .NET Security 部落格中。For more information, see the entry [The Differences Between Rijndael and AES](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) in the .NET Security blog. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加密和解密使用範例資料`RijndaelManaged`類別。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the `RijndaelManaged` class. [!code-cpp[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定密碼編譯作業的區塊大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

value.span: 區塊大小，以位元的密碼編譯作業。

span.span: The block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The default is 128 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework Rijndael 的有效的區塊大小值都是 128、 192 和 256 位元。In .NET Framework, the valid block size values for Rijndael are 128, 192 and 256 bits. 在.NET Core Rijndael 的區塊大小僅可以是 128 位元。In .NET Core, the block size for Rijndael can only be 128 bits. 請參閱的區塊大小的詳細資訊。See the for more information about block size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息，建立使用多載具有相同的簽章。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. `rgbkey`大小必須是 128、 192 或 256 位元。The `rgbkey` size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來解密使用相同的簽章參數編碼的訊息。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to decrypt messages encoded with the same signature parameter.
